attributes.action: Save the country from foreign control and rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hold a referendum on europe before the election is called to stop their new rules dissolving our control of our parliament and country. Then restrict the borders, establish a positive balance of payments, print money and come to an agreement with our debtors. While we are putting the country right bring back the troops and put a cap on immigration. Just my idea. Put more effort into putting right what our country has done wrong in the past. Also reject any laws that would restrict MP's freedoms and opinions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
